magpie.models.classification

Class CumulantExpansionClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.models.BaseModel
      • magpie.models.classification.BaseClassifier
        • magpie.models.classification.CumulantExpansionClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AbstractClassifier, Citable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable

    public class CumulantExpansionClassifier
extends BaseClassifier
implements Savable
    Predict whether instance of a prototype structure will be a member of one of several mutually-exclusive classes. For example, predict whether it will have a negative or positive formation energy. Uses the cumulant-expansion method originally demonstrated by Fisher et al, which is described in more detail in the documentation PhaseDiagramStatistics.

    Requires that dataset be a PrototypeDataset.

    Usage: <filename> <order>
    filename: Path to a file that contains all known compounds.
    order: Number sites in prototype

    Implemented Print Commands

    cumulants [<toPrint>] - Print out the most important cumulant functions for each class
    toPrint: Number of top cumulants to print (default 10)

    Implemented Save Formats:

    cumulants - Print the value of the cumulant between each variable and each class
    Writes a file for each possible value of the class variable

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
